ya5.2.3:1.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:2.1_0: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:3.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:4.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:5.1_0: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:6.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhati tassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:7.1_0: Yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti?
ya5.2.3:8.1_0: Asaññasatte tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati, no ca tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhati …pe….
ya5.2.3:9.1_0: (Yatthakaṁ uppādavārepi nirodhavārepi uppādanirodhavārepi sadisaṁ natthi nānākaraṇaṁ.)
ya5.2.3:10.1_0: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya5.2.3:12.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhatīti?
ya5.2.3:13.1_1: no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:13.1_2: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:13.1_3: tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:14.1_0: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:15.1_0: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhati,
ya5.2.3:15.1_2: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:15.1_3: tesaṁ samudayasaccañca na nirujjhati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:16.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhatīti?
ya5.2.3:17.1_1: no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:17.1_2: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:17.1_3: tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:18.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:19.1_0: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati,
ya5.2.3:19.1_2: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte maggavippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:19.1_3: tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:20.1_0: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhatīti?
ya5.2.3:21.1_1: no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:21.1_2: Taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe maggavippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ
ya5.2.3:21.1_3: tesaṁ samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhati.
ya5.2.3:22.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:23.1_0: Taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhati,
ya5.2.3:23.1_2: Maggavippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ
ya5.2.3:23.1_3: tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhati samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:26.1_0: (Yassakampi yassayatthakampi sadisaṁ, yassayatthakepi nirodhasamāpannānanti na kātabbaṁ.)
ya5.2.3:27.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjittha tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya5.2.3:29.1_0: (Atītā pucchā yathā uppādavāre vibhattā evaṁ uppādanirodhavārepi anulomampi paccanīkampi vibhajitabbaṁ.)
ya5.2.3:30.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:31.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ arahantānaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati,
ya5.2.3:31.1_2: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca uppajjissati samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:33.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:34.1_0: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati,
ya5.2.3:34.1_2: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:36.1_0: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:37.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ uppajjissati,
ya5.2.3:37.1_2: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ samudayasaccañca uppajjissati maggasaccañca nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:38.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.3:39.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:39.1_2: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ maggasaccañca nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca uppajjissati.
ya5.2.3:41.1_0: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:42.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ arahantānaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha …pe…
ya5.2.3:43.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
ya5.2.3:44.1_0: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.3:45.1_0: Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ arahantānaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:45.1_2: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ tesaṁ samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjissati.
ya5.2.3:46.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
ya5.2.3:47.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.3:48.1_0: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:48.1_2: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjissati.
ya5.2.3:49.1_0: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:50.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissati,
ya5.2.3:50.1_1: no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:50.1_2: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ tesaṁ samudayasaccañca nuppajjissati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:51.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya5.2.3:52.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:52.1_2: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca nuppajjissati.
ya5.2.3:55.1_3: arahantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca nuppajjissati.)
ya5.2.3:56.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya5.2.3:58.1_0: (Paccuppannaatītā pucchā uppādavārepi uppādanirodhavārepi yassakampi yatthakampi yassayatthakampi anulomampi paccanīkampi sadisaṁ,
ya5.2.3:59.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:60.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:60.1_1: tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati,
ya5.2.3:60.1_3: Itaresaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca uppajjati samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:61.1_0: Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:62.1_0: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:62.1_2: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca uppajjati.
ya5.2.3:63.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:64.1_0: Arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte
ya5.2.3:64.1_3: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:64.1_4: ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca
ya5.2.3:65.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:66.1_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:66.1_1: tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:66.1_4: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:66.1_5: ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccañca
ya5.2.3:67.1_0: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:68.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati,
ya5.2.3:68.1_2: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ samudayasaccañca uppajjati maggasaccañca nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:69.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:70.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:70.1_1: tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:70.1_4: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccañca nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca uppajjati.
ya5.2.3:72.1_0: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:73.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:73.1_1: tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ …pe…
ya5.2.3:73.1_2: itaresaṁ catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ …pe….
ya5.2.3:74.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:75.1_0: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:75.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati.
ya5.2.3:75.1_2: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca uppajjati.
ya5.2.3:76.1_0: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:77.1_0: Arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ

ya5.2.3:77.1_2: no ca tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:77.1_3: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:77.1_4: ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccañca
ya5.2.3:78.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:79.1_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti

ya5.2.3:79.1_3: no ca tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati.
ya5.2.3:79.1_4: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:79.1_5: ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca
ya5.2.3:80.1_0: Yassa yattha samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:81.1_0: Āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ uppajjati,
ya5.2.3:81.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:81.1_2: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccañca uppajjati maggasaccañca nirujjhissati.

ya5.2.3:85.1_1: no ca tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati.

ya5.2.3:89.1_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:89.1_1: tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:89.1_3: no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:89.1_4: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:89.1_5: tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati
ya5.2.3:90.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:91.1_0: Arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte
ya5.2.3:91.1_1: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:91.1_3: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:91.1_4: tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccañca na
ya5.2.3:92.1_0: Yassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:93.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:93.1_1: tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ samudayasaccaṁ
ya5.2.3:93.1_3: no ca tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:93.1_4: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:93.1_5: taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṁ samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:94.1_0: Yassa vā pana maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:95.1_0: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:95.1_2: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe
ya5.2.3:95.1_3: taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṁ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:97.1_0: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:98.1_0: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati,
ya5.2.3:98.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:98.1_2: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:98.1_3: tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:98.1_4: tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:99.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:100.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:100.1_1: tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:100.1_2: no ca tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:100.1_3: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:100.1_4: tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ
ya5.2.3:100.1_5: tattha samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:101.1_0: Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:102.1_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:102.1_1: tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha
ya5.2.3:102.1_3: no ca tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:102.1_4: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:102.1_5: tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṁ
ya5.2.3:102.1_6: tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:103.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:104.1_0: Arahantānaṁ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ
ya5.2.3:104.1_1: pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:104.1_2: no ca tesaṁ tattha dukkhasaccaṁ nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:104.1_3: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:104.1_4: tesaṁ cavantānaṁ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṁ
ya5.2.3:104.1_5: tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:105.1_0: Yassa yattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:106.1_0: Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti
ya5.2.3:106.1_1: tesaṁ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati,
ya5.2.3:106.1_2: no ca tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya5.2.3:106.1_3: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya
ya5.2.3:106.1_4: bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca
ya5.2.3:107.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya5.2.3:108.1_0: Āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha maggasaccaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya5.2.3:108.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha samudayasaccaṁ nuppajjati.
ya5.2.3:108.1_2: Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṁ āpāyikānaṁ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṁ taṇhāya
ya5.2.3:108.1_3: bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati
ya5.2.3:109.1_0: Yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjittha tassa samudayasaccaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya5.2.3:110.1_0: (Yathā nirodhavāre atītānāgatā pucchā anulomampi paccanīkampi vibhattā evaṁ uppādanirodhavārepi asammohantena vibhajitabbaṁ.)
